org.ftcbootstrap.components.operations.motors

Class MotorToEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ftcbootstrap.components.OpModeComponent
      • org.ftcbootstrap.components.operations.motors.MotorToEncoder

  • public class MotorToEncoder
extends OpModeComponent
    Operation to assist with running a DcMotor with the encoder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MotorToEncoder(ActiveOpMode opMode, DcMotor motor)
      Constructor for operation Telemetry enabled by default.

    • Method Summary

      Check if the operation is running.

      boolean runToTarget(double power, int targetEncoderDistance, MotorDirection direction, DcMotorController.RunMode runMode) 
      void setEncoderResetThreshold(int encoderResetThreshold)
      set the threshold to measure whether the encoder is fully reset fully reset usuall implies the that the motor position is zero but that may be off from time to time due to noise.
      void setEncoderTargetThreshold(int encoderTargetThreshold)
      set the threshold to measure whether the encoder is close to the target position
      void stop()
      Stop the motor
      boolean targetReached()
      check if current encoder position is close to target (choosing within targetEncoderValue of 3 as"close enough")
